title: EASEUS Partition Master 11.0 + All Editions Keys
description:
Features:
Partition Manager
â€¢ Resize/Move partitions to avoid data loss, like extending NTFS system partition without reboot to maximize PC performance.
â€¢ New! Support dynamic disk â€“ resize and copy dynamic volume, convert dynamic disk, etc.
â€¢ New! Safely merge two adjacent partitions into a bigger one without data loss.
â€¢ Create multiple-partitions, delete partition, or directly delete all partitions.
â€¢ New! Wipe data on unallocated space.
â€¢ Wipe disk or wipe partition to permanently wipe sensitive data on disk.
â€¢ Convert dynamic disk to basic disk and Convert FAT to NTFS file system.
â€¢ Convert primary partition to logical partition and vice versa: convert a primary volume to logical to create a fifth volume on a disk with 4 existed primary volumes.
â€¢ Speed up your computer by defragmentation.
â€¢ Disk surface test to check and find bad sectors and rebuild MBR to boot system again.
â€¢ Linux partition management: delete, create, format, recover EXT2/EXT3 partition, etc.
â€¢ Built-in WinPE 3.0 based bootable CD/DVD or Linux based bootable CD/DVD.
â€¢ Support all hardware RAID, multiple removable storage device, hard disk and GPT disk (support up to 2TB partition on MBR and 4TB size on GPT).
â€¢ Support under Windows 2000/XP/Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8 (32 bit & 64 bit).
â€¢ and more
